name: Vedä hatusta!
description:
A game made during Pikku Kakkonen game jam. Game is heavily inspired by childrens drawings of game characters.

Made by

Jammers:

  • Mikko "Mishicu" Aaltio, music, sound design
  • Teemu Kivikangas, art
  • Nancy Nilsson, art
  • Petri Sarasvirta, code
  • Henri Sarasvirta, code

Inspired by:

  • Amanda, 6 years
  • Ella, 5 years
  • Iisak, 6 years
  • Josey, 6 years
  • Taimi, 7 years
  • Veera, 6 years
